unique_internal_blocks.text: Monetary policy is considered to be tight and contributes to a dampening of economic growth and inflation in Denmark.

unique_internal_blocks.title: Policy rates have been lowered, but monetary policy remains restrictive
unique_internal_blocks.text: Danmarks Nationalbank assesses that monetary policy and financial conditions remain restrictive in Denmark.

unique_internal_blocks.title: Monetary and fiscal policy in Denmark - Danmarks Nationalbank
unique_internal_blocks.text: The primary objective of monetary policy is to maintain low and stable inflation. In Denmark the objective is achieved by pegging the Danish krone to the euro.
